title: Two-thirds of women in UK military sexually harassed in past year, survey finds
description: MoD survey also finds nearly one in 10 have been subject to non-consensual sexual activity and a third have been groped or touched
content:
Nearly one in 10 women serving in the British military have been subjected to an assault or other non-consensual sexual activity in the past year, according to the first official survey of sexual harassment across the armed forces.
A third said they ... [4268 chars]

title: Starmer defies calls to sack chief of staff, claiming briefing didn’t come from No 10
description: PM stands by Morgan McSweeney and attempts to draw line under row in which leaks suggested Wes Streeting would launch a leadership challenge
content:
Keir Starmer has attempted to draw a line under extraordinary briefings by his allies that No 10 feared Wes Streeting could launch a leadership coup, insisting he had been reassured it “didn’t come from Downing Street”.

title: BBC faces fresh claim of misleading Trump edit
description: The clip aired on Newsnight in 2022, two years before the Panorama that led to the director-general's resignation.
content:
The BBC was accused of a misleading edit of Donald Trump's 6 January 2021 speech two years before the Panorama sequence that led to the resignation of the director-general.
The clip aired on Newsnight in 2022, and a guest on the live programme challe... [2634 chars]

title: ‘Diabolical move’: Miranda Priestly’s red shoes get Instagram fashion no-no
description: Closeup of studded stilettos in trailer for The Devil Wears Prada 2 causes fashion debate on social media
